mapper.select: SELECT d.customer_name FROM mar_demand a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresume b ON a.demand_id = b.demand_id LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow c ON b.id = demandresume_id AND b.newfollowtime = c.trackingtime LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo d ON b.customer_code = d.customer_code WHERE a.demand_id=#{demandId} and c.follow_status IN ( 1, 3, 5 )

SELECT c.customer_name,b.follow_status from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime=b.trackingtime LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code where a.demand_id=#{demandId} and a.bind_people=#{bindPeople}

select a.demand_id, a.corp_code,a.project_name,b.corp_name as address ,a.target_number,a.add_time, c.nus as demand_number,a.important_level from mar_demand a LEFT JOIN mar_company b on a.corp_code=b.corp_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT f.demand_id,COUNT(f.id) as nus from mar_demandresume f LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow g on f.id=g.demandresume_id and f.newfollowtime=g.trackingtime LEFT JOIN mar_demand h on f.demand_id=h.demand_id where h.state=0 and g.follow_status not in (4,6,8) GROUP BY f.demand_id ) c on a.demand_id=c.demand_id where a.state=0 and a.operationuser=#{userName} order by a.add_time desc

select c.corp_code,c.transforming_people as operationuser,c.corp_name as project_name from (SELECT corp_code from mar_demand a where a.state=0 GROUP BY corp_code)b LEFT JOIN mar_company c on c.corp_code=b.corp_code where c.transforming_people=#{userName}
